description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The Centroids have crash landed on Earth! Defeat the wormlike creatures before they eat you alive! This platfomer/shooter will have you on edge as you chunk and break your way through 30 levels packed full of grubs, guns and more!
description.short: The Centroids have crash landed on Earth! Defeat the wormlike creatures before they eat you alive! This platfomer/shooter will have you on edge as you chunk and break your way through 30 levels packed full of grubs, guns and more!
